example_en: Don't forget to water the plants.

example_en: Plants use photosynthesis to make food.
This perennial comes back every year.
Annual plants live for one season.
Biennial plants bloom in their second year.
Deciduous trees lose leaves in autumn.
Evergreen trees stay green all year.

example_en: This rose cultivar is disease resistant.

example_en: Aphids are damaging the rose bush.

ხელოვნურმა პესტიციდებმა შეიძლება ცხოველებს ზიანი მიაყენოს.

example_en: A healthy garden is a balanced ecosystem.

example_en: Plant succession extends the harvest season.

example_en: Plant adaptation to climate takes time.

example_en: Plants need various nutrients to grow.

example_en: Boron is needed for cell walls.

example_en: Plants store starch in their roots.

example_en: The waxy cuticle prevents water loss.

The petiole connects leaf to stem.
Some plants have stipules at leaf bases.

example_en: These leaves grow in opposite pairs.

example_en: Sessile leaves attach directly to stems.

example_en: The leaf base connects to the petiole.

example_en: These leaves feel smooth to touch.
